title: Zeke Elliott suspension, Sammy Watkins trade (Football 08/14)
description:
After a long weekend of NFL news, Nick Kostos and Will Brinson break down the Ezekiel Elliott suspension (4:00), Sammy Watkins trade (9:10), discuss whether the Bills could crater (12:05), look into the crystal ball for Roberto Augayo's future (17:49), remind everyone that the Andrew Luck injury is becoming a major problem (28:02) and break down the problem with being sprayed with hard cider at a piano bar late at night. Then they welcome in NFL insider Jason La Canfora to break down his recent bizarre travel issues, find out his surprising thoughts on the 49ers being decent this year and then find out about the story around the Seahawks training camp.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
